ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning

Class FlightgearLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.jflightcontroller4pi.tuning.FlightgearLauncher

  • public class FlightgearLauncher
extends java.lang.Object
    Launch Flightgear via the command line. If it is already running we just reset it via telnet. Because this is not very reliable because flightgear tends to crash or hang we need to recover from these situations as well.
    Author:
    pschatzmann

        lauch flightgear via the command line

      • restart

        protected boolean restart()
        Time limited restart. We fail if the restart is not returing within 60 seconds. We need this because sometimes filightgear seems to hang and does not respond to user input any more
        Returns:

      • restart1

        Restart via telnet
